name: Bubble Town
description:
Find your friends in the darkness and help them to rejoin a peaceful place, your home. But be careful, out of your bubble, life can be scary and oppressive ...

Use Headphones for a better sensorial experience. 

(Prototype made in 2 days for the Global Game Jam 2019)

Credits 

Code : Romain Claude

Graphics : Uriel Lacroix

Sound & Music : Loic Guerreau & Alexy Laugier 

OST :
